p: We examined the risk of occurrence of ARI by pig worker status during the follow-up period. Overall, a total of 151 episodes of ARI were reported from 116 participants, giving a combined cumulative incidence of 24.2%. Three-quarters (87) of the participants with ARI reported only one episode, 26 (22.4%) reported two episodes, and three (2.6%) reported between three and five episodes.
